item.title: Python Splinter to Kickstart your Web Automation Testing
item.description: Today automation is the key for any project. Python Splinter is the new tool in Web Automation Testing space. Splinter has an easy to use API when compared to Selenium. Splinter uses Selenium web driver and built on same principles as Selenium. Automation Testing Today web applications are becoming more complex with lot of features. Mobile first approach of web applications requires more testing. Automation will help in testing complex business logic and provide a quality product to the customers.
